articles.title: Ethereum and Stellar's Lumen Daily Tech Analysis – 04/11/19 - FX Empire
articles.description: Stellar's Lumen finds early support, while Ethereum struggles early on. Failure to move through key levels could test the pair later this morning.
articles.content:
For the day ahead
